definitions.text: a cavity or space in something
examples: hunger had caused the hollows in their cheeks
he built himself a cabin in a hollow high up in the Appalachians

definitions.text: a depression hollowed out of solid matter
remove the inner part or the core of
examples: the mining company wants to excavate the hillside

definitions.text: not solid; having a space or gap or cavity
examples: his face became gaunter and more hollow with each year

definitions.text: as if echoing in a hollow space
examples: the hollow sound of footsteps in the empty ballroom
